content: 6 to 9 of the body eyes make two with the black yarn round 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring slip_stitch to the beginning single_crochet 6 fasten_off leaving a long yarn tail for sewing to the body sew the eyes on either side of the nose leaving a two-stitch gap and spanning rnds 6 and 7 of the body @creationsrealized 6 and there you have it you have completed a grub i hope you enjoy the creation you just realized i d love to see your work feel free to post and kindly tag/credit @creationsrealized so i can admire your cool creations with gratitude anna the pattern instructions and images © creations realized 2025 7
